name: Sundance, Destiny 2 Raid coordinator
tagline: Discord Bot to coordinate Destiny 2 raids.
body:
# Discord-Bot This is a personal project to create a bot for my Discord Server to organize Destiny 2 raids. It involves Python, Discord.py API, and MySQL.

sundance.py contains the bot code
test.py contains various code snippets for reference and testing

See the [wiki](https://github.com/michaelScarfi/Discord-Bot/wiki) for information on .env file and MySQL DB needed to run code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
